name: react-exos
description: React 19 training project with Vite, TypeScript, Redux, and Express backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm -C frontend run dev" "pnpm -C backend run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C frontend run build && pnpm -C backend run build
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm -C frontend install && pnpm -C backend install
